description: a(n) = least positive integer > a(n-1) and not of the form a(i)+a(j)+a(k) for 1<=i<j<k<=n.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,1,-1).
formula: {1, 5, 13} union {n congruent 2, 3, 4, 14, 15 mod 23}, proved by Matthew Akeran. - _Ralf Stephan_, Nov 15 2004
author: _Clark Kimberling_
